players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Charlie.
Charlie was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
You: "I'm devastated about Charlie. Does anyone have any ideas on who could be the mafia?"
Bob: "I'm sorry for Charlie's loss. We need to watch who speaks the most or tries to steer blame early. Alice, do you have any suspicions or info from last night?"
Diana: "Alice is the mafia. I investigated her last night. We need to vote her out to keep the town safe."
Bob: "Alice, Diana claims to have investigated you and says you're mafia. Diana, can you explain how you conducted your investigation and why you trust your result so much?"
You: "Diana, that's a serious accusation with no evidence. Maybe you're the mafia trying to deflect. We should vote for you instead."
Diana: "Diana here. I am the detective and I investigated Alice last night. My investigation results are accurate—I am not lying. Voting Alice out is the only way to protect the town."
